::Slayer::

Slayer frowns, landing near the ground, on top of Ignatius, as he hadn't bothered to put him down. He steps off of the other bot.

"So what is it?" he asks, looking at the box.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius scans the area, he knew they were close. "Land there," he said in a
> calm manner pointing towards a patch of grass surrounded by sand. "It has to
> be there." the subtle difference in the landscape was obvious to anyone who
> had a reason to look for it. The eaglebot reached into his memory and found
> a useable signal. activateing his commlink he sent the signal into the Earth
> below. A return signal confirmed his suspicions requesting Trainer
> authorization. Slayer wasn't with the group that had initially landed so the
> box might not recognize him.  Again Ignatius sent a signal to the box
> getting an "Afirmative." the ground rose up, the grassy landmass remaining
> on top making it hard to spot from the air. "Alright, I still got it."
> Ignatius boasted making himself out to seem like an arrogant bot.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Saturday, August 18, 2001 5:37 PM
> Subject: Re: OOC: / Slayer
> 
> 
> > ::Slayer::
> >
> > Slayer nods, speeding up. He was now very close to the object, looking
> around to try to spot it.
> >
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Ignatius kept his scanners aimed toward the other signature. "Just make
> sure
> > > we reach the package first." he was getting desperate to find out what
> > > Prebon had dropped, it wasn't in his memory banks so it must have been
> > > something of a more personal nature.
